mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: "Gents Jump In", "Blue Tail Fly", and "Behind Those Couples". ROUND DANCES "Shanty Town", and "Spanish Circle". SPECIAL FEATURES "Mild Summer Programs", "Canadians Caper", "Kansas Kids Dance and Like It", "Asilomar Institute", and "Square Dancing "To Order"". REGULAR FEATURES "As I See It", "Square of the Month", "Women on the Square", "Events Seen thru the Square Dancer's Eye", "'Round the Outside Ring", "Green Sheet", "From the Floor", "On the Record", and "Calendar of Square Dancing Events".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
